creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: nude male figure at center fighting snakes off of his arms and legs; toddler with a snake on his leg grabs at the man's PL leg, while a young boy to the man's PR struggles with a snake on his own leg; stone archway and pillars in background
marks:
Signature, Title, Date, Inscription

inscribed i monogram in plate, lower left: [HB]
date in plate
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Laocoön
